CARDINAL . The relevant part of the report reads as follows :
“ C. Subjects of concern and recommendations

CARDINAL . ORG remains concerned that despite extensive legislative reforms , impunity and intimidation still persist in ORG , in particular in relation to the use of excessive force , including torture and other forms of illtreatment by lawenforcement officials , especially prior to and during arrest ...

“ Introduction
